titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to create a program to provide funding for organizations that support startup businesses in formation and early growth stages by providing entrepreneurs with resources and services to produce viable businesses, and for other purposes.
SOAR Act
SOAR Act
Startup Opportunity Accelerator Act of 2019

SOAR Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
